text: Carmine Appice ( ) (born December 15, 1946) is an American drummer and percussionist. He played with Vanilla Fudge; Cactus; the power trio Beck, Bogert & Appice; Rod Stewart; King Kobra; and Blue Murder. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:American rock drummers Category:American blues musicians Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American heavy metal singers Category:American rock singers Category:American blues singers Category:Singer-songwriters from New York City Category:Musicians from New York City
title: Carmine Appice
